Guys, please help. :/
im done downloading with this and all i see is "files".
please help.

@EnemyLine You need to unzip the files using 7zip you can download it for free, after unzip, you will get a .iso file, you can mount that iso file using daemon tools lite wich is a free version, after that i think u are good to go only instal game, and play.

im playin it now. thnx thnx thnx ^^
